job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: We are looking for a strongSoftware Engineerstrong who is responsible for the development and maintenance of a SaaS application portfolio The ideal candidate is interested in creating innovative applications and loves to work on the cutting edge of technology and be comfortable across a range of technologies We need someone who is resourceful in getting things done  a productive team member that is both independent and collaborativebrbrYou should be excited about experimenting and pushing boundaries Our ideal teammates are constantly looking to learn something new and become better at what they do  whether that means doing selfdriven research or asking the other individuals questions where they are most knowledgeablebrbrWhat You BringbrbrYou will need to wear many hats and be able to strategically work with your team to successfully deliver solutions to our customers You should be excited to learn influence and contribute to a team as well as be an expert in at least one language or domainbrulli3 years of professional development experience liliStrong HTML CSS JavaScript and knowledge of web standardsliliExperience with a modern frontend JavaScript framework React Vuejs SvelteliliWorking knowledge of component libraries or internal design systems Storybook PatternLab etcliliA passion for learning new things and solving our customers problemsbrliulTechnologies youll be exposed tobrulliReact with ReduxliliRuby on RailsliliSass with a BEM influenced structureliliCypress Jest and React Testing LibraryliliStorybookliliWebpack and BabelliliGit and GitlabliliFigmabrliulExtra CreditbrulliExperience working on customer facing components websites and applicationsliliExperience in CSS architecture through CSSonly frameworks or as part of component library developmentliliExperience with building and consuming RESTful APIs andor MicroservicesliliExperience working with Ruby on RailsliliExperience with Docker or KubernetesbrliulSo Whats GoCanvasbrbrGoCanvas is a mobile platform that makes it simple for businesses to automate how work is done replacing outdated processes and expensive paperwork The GoCanvas App works on smartphones and tablets helping companies easily collect information across their organization share it instantly with others and gain realtime insight on their business operations GoCanvas can be easily customized by all types of businesses to empower their workforce unleashing the value in data across the organization to help better connect with colleagues and engage more effectively with customers Automating millions of workplace activities for wellknown brands like UnderArmour Pepsi Honda and Red Bull means theres a good chance you have been around someone using GoCanvas in the past 24 hours making us one of the fastestgrowing mobile platforms in the worldbrbrOur recent achievements as an organization include but are not limited to being named by Deloitte as one of the in both 2017 and 2018 coming in at 261 in 2018 for 331 company growth We are also celebrating our second year in a row winning Gold for Fastest Growing Company and Silver for the Best Places to Work the 2018 and 2019 and last but definitely not least as one of the Best Places to Work in 2019 by andbrbrEveryone from topranking executives to newlyhired employees is passionate about helping businesses function better with technology The team has attained what few can by successfully blending a driven and fastpaced workforce with an open supportive attitude that has contributed much to the companys overall growthbrbrWere on a mission to continue fostering an amazing culture for people who like to make an impact and enjoy collaboratingbrbrWhat GoCanvas BringsbrbrWe believe hiring the right people is THE most important thing we do We take our company values seriously and look for these traits in everyone we hire Empathy Innovation Authenticity Impactful Team Player and CheekyFun Loving We believe in giving people the freedom to get things done but that they should also have accountability for their key metrics think and act like owners of our business and be able to work in a flat organizational structure We provide an environment that allows for innovation and creativity as well as a chance for highly motivated individuals to have fun at workbrbrWhile we believe culture trumps perks we are proud to provide a comprehensive benefits package designed to meet our team members needsbrulliCompetitive CompensationliliEntrepreneurial Vacation Policy sometimes known as unlimited vacationlili13 CompanyPaid Holidays including GoCanvass BirthdayliliMedical Insurance where the Employee Only level of coverage is freeliliDental and Vision InsuranceliliHealth Savings Account depending upon your medical plan selectionliliBasic Term Life Insurance and Personal Accident InsuranceliliVoluntary Life InsuranceliliShort and LongTerm Disabilitylili401k plan with employer matchliliPet InsuranceliliParental LeavebrliulWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills The more inclusive we are the better our work will bebrbrIf you need special assistance or accommodation while seeking employment with us please email recruitinggocanvascom or call 703 5478588brbrWe are interested in every qualified candidate who is eligible to work in the United States However we are not able to sponsor visasbrbrNo 3rd party recruiting firms submitting candidates from job sites strongThis role is a opportunitybrbrstrongPowered by JazzHRbrbrZHoCUHTotYbrbr
